body.name: Arcciit Mens Crewneck Long Sleeve Textured Ribbed Edge Pullover Sweaters Knitted Sweater Tops
features: Care instructions Machine Wash, Hand Wash Only
The pullover features a textured knit like material,Checkerboard Knit, Stand Collar with two buttons make you have two way in neckline ,basic simple design
Match:Easy to Wear with Jeans to create a smart leisure look,or layer with jackets or coats to keep warm in cold days.
Quality fabrics provide optimal softness and comfort. Durable and lightweight.Stretch fabric provides warmth and fit.
Garment Care: Hand wash or machine wash recommended with low temperature water, using mild gentle soap, no bleach
Size Tips: Available in S-3XL.Please Refer to the Sweater tops Size Chart to better show your charming Look (It's different from Amazon Size).
body.description: Arcciit turtleneck pullover sweater updates your cool-weather top wardrobe a ribbed shawl collar define the timeless appeal of this cozy, cotton sweater The soft and warm yarns are knit in a Checkerboard texture for retention of warmth in this handsome shawl-collared sweater. The front neck buttons allow for easy layering, while the ribbed cuffs and hem offer a polished finish with a regular fit. You can match a T-shirt underneath or a casual button-down shirt for a more formal look.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A two-button shawl collar and checkerboard texture define a handsome pullover sweater detailed with the faux leather patches for a professorial look. Dress up your off-duty or smart-casual business ensembles with this Shawl Collar Pullover. Rendered in a solid hue, the pullover sweatshirt is made of midweight yarn with ribbed edges for snug warmth.The regular fit that hits below the waist allows for comfortable layering over your shirts and tees, and the ribbed shawl collar gives it a classy aesthetic.
Arcciit Mens Textured Shawl Collar Sweaters

Pullover Construction Solid, Textured Fabric Fit Type: Regular Fit Fabric: High Stretch Composition: 100% Polyester Sheer: No Arcciit turtleneck pullover sweater updates your cool-weather top wardrobe a ribbed shawl collar define the timeless appeal of this cozy, cotton sweater The soft and warm yarns are knit in a Checkerboard texture for retention of warmth in this handsome shawl-collared sweater. The front neck buttons allow for easy layering, while the ribbed cuffs and hem offer a polished finish with a regular fit. You can match a T-shirt underneath or a casual button-down shirt for a more formal look.
From Arcciit, mens cable knit sweater features: Shawl Collar Faux Leather Patches Long Sleeves with Ribbed Cuffs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really didn't expect this Sweater to be this Nice and Heavy. Fits great, true to size, warm, soft, and looks Spectacular! No kidding, so far every single person that I know that has seen me wear it has said how great it looks and peppered me with questions on how much and where did I get it. I hope it lasts long enough so I don't have to come back to downgrade my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A Beautiful sweate that feels silky and luxurious as well as sturdy and well-made. Arrived quickly and exceeded my expectations. The cowl neck with the buttons is a nice manly touch. The color navy is actually a cobalt blue that is luscious. I must return for a medium instead of small because the sleeves are a little short and it is somewhat fitted because of the elasticity. A young thin boy or man could wear it if it does stretch as much as is possible with the stretch in the material! A really expensive looking casual/dressy sweater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Handsome and well fitting.
reviews.reviewText: Other than some stitching issues typical to sweaters in this price range, I'm satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A quality sweater
reviews.reviewText: It came in a clear bag which I didn't prefer but no sweater thieves got it. It's just as I had hoped, fits great is good and warm. An excellent price for this quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit, decently warm, great collar
reviews.reviewText: Had this for a few months now, got it as sweater for work, but I've warn it out on a couple dates and family events.It keeps me warm at work and does a decent job in the outdoors. Wouldn't recomend for sleeping under the stars, but walking around town with a date or going to Christmas lights it's greatWhen I bought it though I was concerned about the collar, saw alot of reviews with it hooking high up on the neck or akward. I found the trick to making it look like the advertised photos is to fold the collar in 1/3 rds.Looks great, feels great, yeah if you snag it it could undo some stitching, but it's a sweater, it that's your biggest concern get a denim jacket or a plastic poncho. 100% recomend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits great, feels snug and love the style and color. Received as seen. Surpassed my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for taller folks, size chart is off
reviews.reviewText: I’m 6’5”, 255, 50” chest, 36-38” waist, 37” sleeve length. I usually wear an XL Tall, sometimes a 2X Tall.Looking at the size chart, I should probably wear a 3XL, but Amazon suggested that an XL would fit. Several reviews said the sleeves were long, and the sweater would stretch. They were right. The chart was wrong.I got an XL, and it stretches just enough to look good in the chest, and the arms are long enough with just a bit of slack. I wore it last weekend while traveling and got a couple compliments. It basically fit like it does in the first few pictures. The only thing that was a bit snug was the shawl collar, which I buttoned up, but had to adjust a couple of times to get it to not roll up. I wore it over a long sleeve wicking tee. It’s polyester, but it felt like a cotton sweater. I got a fair amount of fuzz on the shirt, wearing it the first time, but it was soft and comfortable.If you are taller and have an athletic or weightlifter’s build, this may be a good option for you. The sleeves and body are longer, and you have to hand wash (or maybe machine wash gentle/delicate) the sweater anyway, so shrinkage shouldn’t be an issue. If you’re six foot or shorter, you’ll probably have some extra length in the sleeves to push up. If you are less athletic, though, it has some stretch through the belly to hide a bit of extra weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars it was a nice sweather the collar was to high
